location: Farm open area near duck shelter, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: strong_midday_sunlight_farm_area
summary: Strong sunlight observed over farm area during daytime.
description: This data unit documents visual observation of strong daylight sun exposure across the farm area, including open ground and duck shelter structures. No temperature values are inferred from the image.
